sentence.Network_en: Despite their queasiness, if war comes, most MPs will back our lads.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然感到不安，但是如果战争来临，大多数议员还是会支持我们的小伙子的。

sentence.Network_en: The food did nothing to stifle her queasiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 食物并没有压住她想呕吐的感觉。

sentence.Network_en: This medicine will counteract the queasiness caused by the antibiotics.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种药会抑制抗生素引起的反胃.

remove the useful bits from annual reports-the accounts-and you are mainly left with a queasy stew of executive portraits and mission statements .这家大私募股权公司的年报里面如果除去有用的账目信息，剩下的就是经理主管令人作呕的烩肉似的头像以及愿景声明。

entry.def: If you feel queasy or if you have a queasy stomach, you feel rather ill, as if you are going to be sick.

example.ex: He was very prone to seasickness and already felt queasy.
example.tran: 他快晕船了，已经感到恶心了。

entry.def: If you feel queasy about something, you are a little worried about it.

example.ex: Some people feel queasy about how their names and addresses have been obtained.
example.tran: 一些人为自己的姓名和地址是如何被泄露出去的感到不安。

auth_sentence.content: Evidently, none has the slightest queasiness about their choice of nutrition.
auth_sentence.res_content: Evidently, none has the slightest queasiness about their choice of nutrition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Evidently, none has the slightest queasiness about their choice of nutrition.

auth_sentence.content: Many independents also have some queasiness about some very serious budget problems, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many independents also have some queasiness about some very serious budget problems, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many independents also have some queasiness about some very serious budget problems, he said.

auth_sentence.content: But the queasiness starts on the train, where my wheelchair sways a little, and then continues in the taxi.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the queasiness starts on the train, where my wheelchair sways a little, and then continues in the taxi.
